page.title: 03Recreation in Barrhead
page.content: The Barrhead{Sports Centre}was opened in 1976.It accommodates over a hundred sports of which swimming is the most popular.Other facilities include a sauna,a dance area, a licensed bar and a cafeteria. The centre is busiest at the weekend and when it is sponsoring a competition.At these times there can be up to 1000 people in the centre.For this reason 54 people are employed there. Other recreational facilities in Barrhead include the following{clubs:_ Angling,Horticulture,Bowling,Snooker, Golf and Football.There are also two {choirs, a Burgh Band}and several Schools of Dancing.
